product sn program how to
[Product sn howto] 

the firmware to check product sn when boot follow these steps: (this will finished in rootfs)
	read the sn flash partition,compute the checksum.
	checksum equal to 0 
		update the data file: /etc/cit.ini( update the product sn) 
		exit sn_program and normal boot
	checksum not equal to 0 : means never set product sn. 
		print some text  on the screen to tell user scan the product sn 
		Read barcode from scanning port, if barcode equal to "Starting Setting"'s barcode 
			read product sn from sacnning port and end it with "End Setting" 's barcode 
		Note: If not get "End Setting" 's barcode in 60 second ,the program will exit and normal boot.
			if get any sn barcode and the last barcode is "End Setting" 's barcode,compute checksum ,write length of sn , barcode, checksum  into the sn partition. 
			update the data file : /etc/cit.ini (update the product sn) 
			exit sn_program and normal boot
	
the program in the application to update check product sn follow these steps:
	read barcode from scanning port 
	the barcode equal to "Starting Setting" 's barcode 
		the barcode equal to "Product sn Setting" 's barcode(020704) 
		read product sn from scanning port 
		the setting end with the "End Setting" 's barcode 
		If get any product sn , it must write into the sn flash partition and update the file: /etc/cit_sn.ini
    NOTE:  Add support: add product sn in the discovery reply buffer

CHINA. FuJian Newland Computer CO., Ltd
